content: A powerful mid-latitude cyclone is strengthening off the coast of California, Washington, and Oregon. It's intensifying rapidly, a process called bombogenesis.
summary: A powerful mid-latitude cyclone is strengthening off the coast of California, Washington, and Oregon. It's intensifying rapidly, a process called bombogenesis.

title: Gift an 8-in-1 clip-on charger for the techie who has everything for just $25
content: Gift the ultimate 8-in-1 charger with GoCable on sale for just $24.99 (reg. $44) — ideal for techies, older teens, and travelers alike. Charge phones, laptops, and USB-C devices on the go.
